phrases.phrase: Renders a section displaying the latest showcase item comments in the activity summary email.
Renders a section displaying the latest items in the activity summary email. Items can be filtered on various criteria.
Renders a section displaying the latest showcase item reviews in the activity summary email.
Renders a section displaying the latest showcase item updates in the activity summary email.
Showcase Item view: Above item sections content
Showcase Item view: Below item sections content
Advertising position above the item sections content when viewing an item.
Advertising position below the item sections content when viewing an item.
Comments on a watched showcase item
Mentions you in a showcase item comment
Reacts to your showcase item comment
Adds a new showcase item to a watched category
Mentions you in a showcase item
Mentions you in a showcase item review
Reacts to your showcase item review
Replies to your review on a showcase item
Also replies to a review on a showcase item
Reacts to your reply to a review on a showcase item
Replies to a review on your showcase item
Replies to your review on a showcase item
Mentions you in an update on a showcase item
Reacts to your update on a showcase item
Replies to your update on a showcase item
Also replies to an update on a showcase item
Reacts to your reply to an update on a showcase item
Replies to an update on your showcase item
Replies to your update on a showcase item
BB code for displaying showcase items
Showcase comment removed from public view (reason: {reason})
Showcase item removed from public view (reason: {reason})
Showcase review removed from public view (reason: {reason})
Showcase review reply removed from public view (reason: {reason})
Showcase review reply author warning expired
Showcase review reply author given warning
Showcase review reply author warning removed
Showcase item update removed from public view (reason: {reason})
Showcase update reply removed from public view (reason: {reason})
Showcase update reply author warning expired
Showcase update reply author given warning
Showcase update reply author warning removed
Showcase item update author warning expired
Showcase item update author given warning
Showcase item update author warning removed
Automatically unfeature any "featured" items older than x days.
Default featured map marker icon url
Display cover image in the header area
Display description in the header area
Display description in the item details area
Exclude featured items from items listing on index and category pages
Include image attachments from comments in the gallery (Own tab)
Include image attachments from posts in the gallery (Own tab)
Include image attachments from reviews, in the gallery (Own tab)
Show Points of Interest on Category maps
List the file extensions that are allowed to be uploaded to items. Use spaces or line break between extensions.
The maximum number of items to display in the "More from [author name]" sidebar block. Use 0 to disable this block.
If enabled, will automatically unfeature any featured items that are older than x days (from the date the item was featured).
The maximum number of items to display in the "More in [category]" sidebar block. Use 0 to disable this block.
List the file extensions that are allowed to be uploaded to comments. Use spaces or line break between extensions.
Provide the maximum comment attachment file size in kilobytes (KB). Attachments over this size will be rejected.
The maximum number of characters that can be in an item comment. This includes BB code. Use 0 to disable the limit.
If enabled, will display the cover image (or the category image) in the header area. This will also launch the gallery to view image attachments.
If enabled, will display the cover image in a sidebar block above the item details block.
If enabled, will display the brief description in the header area.
If enabled, will display the brief description in the item details area.

When enabled, will display sections 1-6 content (rich text and custom fields) on the associated discussion thread above the messages.

Note: If you have the option to display sections as Tabs, only Section 1 will be displayed,
If enabled, members will be able to browse an alphabetical list of authors. This can have performance implications with a large number of authors.
When enabled, will remove duplicate items from the Showcase Index and Category pages that are already being fetched for the featured items carousel or grid block.

When enabled, the Category navigation block will expand the entire category tree.

Note: If you wish to control expanding category navigation on a per category level, do not set this option as this option overrides the per category option. Instead, use the per category option instead!
Choose the display type you want to use to display featured items on showcase index, category pages and other various pages with item listings.

The number of featured items you want to fetch for display in the featured items carousel on Showcase index and Showcase category pages. Use 0 to disable the featured items carousel or grid block. Note: The featured grid block is limited to displaying 3 items.
Controls where the collection of uploaded file attachments will be displayed
Controls the display type (single block or multiple blocks) of the image gallery when set to "Own tab".
Controls where the collection of uploaded images will be displayed
Input your Google Maps Embed API Key here. Instructions on generating and retrieving your Google Maps Embed API key can be found here.
Input your Google Maps Geocoding API Key here. Instructions on generating and retrieving your Google Maps Geocoding API key can be found here.
Input your Google Maps JavaScript API Key here. Instructions on generating and retrieving your Google Maps JavaScript API key can be found here.

This option allows you to include comments image attachments from the comments section in the image gallery. This option is only available when the 'Image gallery location' option is set to "Own tab".

This option allows you to include posts image attachments from the associated discussion thread, in the showcase item image gallery. This option is only available when the 'Image gallery location' option is set to "Own tab".
This option allows you to include reviews image attachments in the showcase item image gallery. This option is only available when the 'Image gallery location' option is set to "Own tab".

Choose the type of Home Page that you want to use for Showcase.
  • Standard = Index of all items in a filterable listing.
  • Modular = Blank page with Main and Sidebar Widget Locations

Provide the maximum item attachment file size in kilobytes (KB). Attachments over this size will be rejected.

Important Note: The option "Maximum attachments per items" has been removed and is now set via Showcase Permissions!
When an item is deleted, take this action with any automatically created thread associated with the item.

Choose the layout type you want to use to display items on showcase index, category pages and other various pages with item listings. Note: Individual category pages can override this setting and use a different layout type.
The maximum number of characters that can be in an item. This includes BB code. Note: Use 0 to disable the limit.
The number of items that will be listed per page on various pages with item listings. Note: does not apply to pages using grid view layout!
The number of items that will be listed per page on various pages with item listings that use the grid view layout type.
The number of items that will be listed per page on various pages with item listings that use the item view layout type.
The number of items that will be listed per page on various pages with item listings that use the tile view layout type.

This is the number of days old that a review can be in order for it to be fetched. Reviews that are older than the cutoff date will not be displayed. Leave this option set to 0 to bypass the cut off date.

This is the number of days old that an update can be in order for it to be fetched. Updates that are older than the cutoff date will not be displayed. Leave this option set to 0 to bypass the cut off date.
Users that do not have the permission to view full items will only see this number of characters of the Section 1 message for the item.
When viewing various pages with item listings, this will be the default sort order that is set.
When enabled, will localize various google maps (both Embed API generated and JS API generated) throughout Showcase, based on XF language settings for the viewing user.
Controls how the location data will be displayed when viewing an item

When enabled, the MarkerClustererPlus library used in combination with the Maps JavaScript API, will combine map markers of close proximity to one another into clusters to simplify the display of markers on the map at various zoom levels.
Enter a meta description for your Showcase Home Page. This will be placed inside the meta description tag on the SC Index page, so avoid using HTML.
If a review is entered, it will not be accepted unless it is at least this long. If a review is not required, this setting will be ignored if no review is entered.
When the "Display location" above is set to "Below item", you can choose the layout type you want to use to display items in the "More from [author]" block.
Controls where the "More from [author name]" block will be displayed
When the "Display location" above is set to "Below item", you can choose the layout type you want to use to display items in the "More in [category name]" block.
Controls where the More in [category name] block will be displayed
The style selected here will be displayed on all showcase pages instead of the default style.

The maximum number of recent reviews to display on the main item view page.
Note: Use 0 to disable this block.

The maximum number of recent item updates to display on the main item overview page.
Note: Use 0 to disable this block.
If enabled, a review title must be included when posting new reviews or editing existing reviews.
List the file extensions that are allowed to be uploaded to reviews. Use spaces or line break between extensions.
Provide the maximum review attachment file size in kilobytes (KB). Attachments over this size will be rejected.
The maximum number of characters that can be in an item review. This includes BB code. Use 0 to disable the limit.
The maximum number of characters that can be in a review reply. Use 0 to disable the limit.

Choose how you want sections 2-6 to display on an item.
  • Stacked = Sections 2-6 will be displayed on the overview page with Section 1 stacked from top to bottom in order
  • Tabbed = Sections 2-6 will be displayed in their own individual tab (its own page)

When enabled, will include points of interest on Category maps (this is default standard with google maps). Disable this option if you want to "clean up" the map from looking cluttered.
Note: This does not apply to individual item maps.
If enabled, the ave rating filter will be enabled on item listing pages
If enabled, the title filter will be enabled on item listing pages
Allows you to set the display order of the [Search showcase] tab.
When enabled, signatures will display on comments just like they do on posts.
The number of characters of the item preview to display on the item view layout type.
The number of characters of the item preview to display on the list view layout type.
If enabled, the count of unread items will display above the "Showcase" navigation tab.
The maximum number of characters that can be in an item update. This includes BB code. Use 0 to disable the limit.
The maximum number of characters that can be in an item update reply. Use 0 to disable the limit.
Options that control the showcase add-on.
Time limit on editing/deleting own comments (minutes)
Time limit on editing/deleting own items (minutes)
Time limit on editing/deleting own item update replies (minutes)
Time limit on editing/deleting own reviews (minutes)
Ban users from posting comments/ratings on an item
Lock / unlock comments for own item
Lock / unlock ratings for own item
Manage tags by others in own item
Reply to reviews on own item
Self join contributors team on any item within categories that allow self join contributors team
You don’t have permission to view this page. Please purchase a premium membership package to view this page.
The elements selected here will be displayed on the Featured Carousel on SC Index, SC Category pages and SC Featured Carousel Widgets.
This setting allows you to choose whether to show 1 item at a time or 2 items at a time.
The elements selected here will be displayed on the Featured Grid Block.
The elements selected here will be displayed on the Grid View Layout.
The elements selected here will be displayed on the Item View Layout.
The elements selected here will be displayed on widgets created with the SC: Latest items widget definition and display style "Full - Carousel"
This setting allows you to choose whether to show 1 item at a time or 2 items at a time.
The elements selected here will be displayed on widgets created with the SC: Featured or Latest items widget definition and display style "Simple - Carousel"
The elements selected here will be displayed on the Latest items Grid Block.
The elements selected here will be displayed on the List View Layout.
The elements selected here will be displayed on the Tile View Layout.
A number of properties to control the appearance of XenAddons Showcase
Displays featured items from the showcase item management system
Displays the specified poll in a widget.
Displays a map with markers for showcase items with location data.
Displays the latest showcase item reviews.
Displays the latest showcase item updates.
Displays inside the sidenav on the author list index page.
Displays inside the sidenav on author pages.
A position inside the main content area of the category page above the items list.
Displays inside the side navigation on the showcase category pages. Widget templates rendered in this position can use the current category entity in the {$context.category} param.
A position inside the main content area of the showcase index page above the items list.
Displays inside the side navigation on the showcase item management system index page.
Displays inside the main column on the showcase modular index page, so can support larger widgets.
Displays inside the sidebar on the showcase modular index page.
A cover image or content image
If no categories are explicitly selected, this widget will pull from all categories unless used within a Showcase category. In this case, the content will be limited to that category and descendents.
All comments and reviews from the other items will be merged into this item.
All selected items are already in the destination category. Please select another category.
When enabled, users will have the option to leave an anonymous review.
When enabled, this option allows the item author to set an author rating when creating or editing the item. This rating is separate from user ratings.
These are the regular customer-facing hours of operation for a typical week.

This option allows comments for items in this category. This option can be enabled/disabled at any time and only effects items within this specific category. Important note: Comment Permissions determine whether or not the viewing user can view/post comments.
This option allows item owners with appropriate permissions, to add contributors and or co-owners.
This option allows items to be created in this category. Disabling this option does not prevent existing items from being moved into this category.

When this option is enabled, a location field will be available on the item create/edit form. This location field will be used to display a link in the header or Information sidebar block that when clicked on will open up a Google map to the location.
When this option is enabled, a poll can be added to items within this category.
When enabled, users will be able to input pros and cons when submitting a review for an item.
When enabled, users with the appropriate permissions will be able to rate and or review items within this category.
When enabled, members with the appropriate permissions can vote on reviews.
Allows members with the appropriate permissions to self join the contributor team for a given item in this category.
The items you have selected are located in more than one category. Each item will only be updated if the chosen prefix is valid in its category.
This action will associate an existing discussion thread with this item.
Automatically post in the item thread on item deletion
Automatically post new review notice in thread
If selected, whenever a new review is posted on an item in this category, a post will be made in the discussion thread associated with the item.
Automatically post new item update notice in thread
If selected, whenever a new item update is added to an item in this category, a post will be made in the discussion thread associated with the item.
Add a specific URL that you want the block title to link to. Leaving this blank will link to "New Items"
Can not change date into the future.
Can not set comment date older than the item create date.
Can not set reply date older than the review date.
Can not set review date older than the item create date.
A full size view, displaying items in a carousel style slider.

This content is optional and is used to display custom content on the first page of a category before the listing of items.

You may use HTML. The text (or HTML) you insert here must be valid within a <p> tag.
The type of content being reviewed for this category, eg Product, Vehicle, Movie, Game, Guide, How to etc etc etc. Note: If you leave this blank, the generic term "Item" will be used.
This title is optional and will be used to generate a Title bar for the category content. If you leave the title blank, the category content will not have a title bar.
Category does not allow new items to be added.
Comment on item {itemTitle} by {userName}
A comment on the item {title} was reassigned to you.
When enabled, registered users or guests with appropriate permissions may comment on this spa.
Custom featured map marker icon url
This allows you to override the default featured map marker and display a custom featured map marker for featured items in this category.
This allows you to override the default map marker and display a custom map marker for items in this category.
You may specify an item prefix to be automatically selected when visitors create new items in this category. The selected prefix must also be selected in the 'Available prefixes' list above.

This allows you to preset one or more tags on the add spa form for item created within this category. Note: These tags are not force added, the member creating the item can remove then prior to creating the new item.
Display as map below item (requires API Key)
Display as map in own tab (requires API Key)
Display as map in sidebar block (requires API Key)
When enabled, will display the cover image (if set), above the item.
When enabled, this field will be displayed with the item information on various item listing pages
Display items on the showcase index page

When enabled, items from this category will be displayed on the Showcase Index Page (if viewable by the viewing user).

Note: When disabled, items from this category will still be displayed on Category Pages and other various Showcase pages, Widgets etc that display items.
Display as link in item information block

When this option is enabled, some location data (City, State, Country) will be displayed on listing pages using List View, Grid View, Tile View, Item View and Carousel layouts. You can choose a specific display type below.
Display type: City, State (Mountain View, California)
Display type: City, State, Country (Mountain View, California, United States)
Display type: City, State, Country short (Mountain View, California, US)
Display type: City, State short (Mountain View, CA)
Display type: City, State short, Country short (Mountain View, CA, US)
Display type: Formatted address (1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043)
You do not have permission to view the full content of this item.
Do not include image attachments from comments
Do not include image attachments from posts
Draft item awaiting publishing before being displayed publicly!
This option requires a Google Maps Geocoding API Key and a Google Maps JavaScript API Key. These API Keys must be set in the Showcase Map Options!
If enabled, will display the editor to allow users to enter custom WYSIWYG content for the specific section.
This option requires a Google Maps Geocoding API Key and a Google Maps JavaScript API Key. These API Keys must be set in the Showcase Map Options!
Checking this option will exclude any featured items from being fetched.
Existing discussion thread is already associated with another piece of content.

When enabled, this category will be expanded on the Category Navigation Block (one sub level only).

Note: If you want the entire category tree for this specific category to be exapanded, you will need to edit each sub category in the trees and set this option.
Explain why you're giving this rating. Reviews which are not constructive may be removed without notice.
A full size view, displaying featured items in a carousel style slider.
A full size view, displaying featured items in a grid block container.
This filter allows you to fetch results for a specific City, State, Country etc (similar to the location filter on Item Listing pages).
From owner, co-owners and contributors only
A full size view, displaying as a standard item list.
A full size view, displaying as a standard review list.
A full size view, displaying as a standard update list.
When enabled, the title of the field will not be displayed on the item, only the field content.
If enabled, only featured items will be fetched.
If selected, whenever an item in this category is created, a thread will be posted in this forum. Only "general discussion" type forums may be selected.
If selected, only staff will be able to see who wrote this review.
If selected, a post will be made automatically on the creator's behalf explaining that the item is no longer available.
If selected, users will be required to select a prefix when creating or editing an item. This will not be enforced for moderators.
Include showcase item updates and replies
Item has at least X rating average
Item has at least X reaction score
Item has at least X reviews
Item has at least X views
This thread is for the general discussion of the {term} [url={item_link}][plain]{title}[/plain][/url]. Please add to the discussion here.
{username} posted a new item update [url={update_link}][plain]{update_title}[/plain][/url] on the {term} [url={item_link}][plain]{item_title}[/plain][/url]
Item was created no more than X days ago
Item was updated no more than X days ago
{item} - New showcase item in watched category
{itemTitle} posted in item category {categoryTitle}
The item {title} was reassigned to you.
A full size view, displaying items in a grid block container. (best used with random sort order)
Specify the maximum number of comments that should be shown in this widget.
This is the number of days old that an item can be in order for it to be fetched. Items that are older than the cutoff date will not be fetch. Leave this option set to 0 to bypass the cut off date.

This is the number of days old that a review can be in order for it to be fetched. Reviews that are older than the cutoff date will not be displayed. Leave this option set to 0 to bypass the cut off date.
Specify the maximum number of reviews that should be shown in this widget.

This is the number of days old that an update can be in order for it to be fetched. Updates that are older than the cutoff date will not be displayed. Leave this option set to 0 to bypass the cut off date.
Specify the maximum number of updates that should be shown in this widget.

Enter the address of the location associated with your item if you wish to link to a google map.
eg 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043
The maximum allowed number of contributors/co-owners that can be set for a given item within this category.
Member submitted images via discussion thread posts
Members who have reacted to comment by {user}
Members who have reacted to review by {user}
Members who have reacted to review reply by {user}
Members who have reacted to update by {user}
Members who have reacted to update reply by {user}
The title used in the title tag. A meta title, also known as a title tag, refers to the text that is displayed on search engine result pages and browser tabs to indicate the topic of a webpage.

This option allows you to set a minimum required message length for this section.
Note: Leave set to 0 to disable this option.
This allows you to require users to enter at least this many tags when adding items or editing tags on existing items.
If the selected items(s) have any prefixes applied which are not valid in the selected category, those prefixes will be removed.
The new item discussion thread must be a standard discussion thread.
New update posted on watched item
No categories have been created yet.
No items have been added yet.
No items have been created yet.
No items have been featured yet.
There are no pending items to view
No prefixes are available for the specified categories.
No reviews have been left recently.
No updates have been posted recently.
No updates have been posted yet
Note that the item author will see this alert even if they can no longer view their item.
Notify the current and new owners of this action.
Notify item author of this action
Notify members watching the destination category
Notify members watching the destination item
The Open Graph / Twitter title used on social media (Facebook, Twitter etc).
Only display within selected categories (rather than including child categories)
Override default item list layout type
This option allows you to override the default item list layout type and set a different item list layout type for this category
Override the sc option 'Item list default sort order'
This option allows you to override the showcase option 'Item list default sort order' and set a different item list default sort order for this category.
Please confirm that you want to associate an existing discussion thread with this item.
Please confirm that you want to lock comments on
Please confirm that you want to lock ratings on
Please confirm that you want to publish the following item now
Please confirm that you want to unassociate discussion thread from this item.
Please confirm that you want to unlock comments on
Please confirm that you want to unlock ratings on
Please entry a valid section 1 title.
Please provide a review with your rating.
Send Alerts and Emails to members that are watching this item. If unchecked, will save as a Silent Edit.
The prefix will only be applied if it is valid for the category the item is in or is being moved to.

Provide a brief summary of your category for search engines.

A meta description can influence the decision of the searcher as to whether they want to click through on your category from search results or not. The more descriptive, attractive and relevant the description, the more likely someone will click through.

Provide a brief summary of your item for search engines.

A meta description can influence the decision of the searcher as to whether they want to click through on your item from search results or not. The more descriptive, attractive and relevant the description, the more likely someone will click through.
Optional: Provide a very brief description of your spa
Publish item at a scheduled date/time
When enabled, registered users with appropriate permissions may rate/review this spa.
Reply to review by '{user}' on item '{title}'
Reply to update '{update_title}' by '{user}' on item '{item_title}'
The requested item could not be found.
Only items that have a cover image set or are in a category that has a content image set, will be fetched.
When this option is enabled, an image attachment must be uploaded in order for the item to be created.
When enabled, users must submit a review when rating an item.
Review on item {itemTitle} by {userName}
A review on the item {title} was reassigned to you.
Review reply on item {itemTitle} by {userName}
A reply to a review on the item {title} was reassigned to you.
The optional review title should be a summarized view of the entire review with 100 characters or less.

The review title should be a summarised view of the entire review with 100 characters or less.
A Review title is required when submitting a review.
A full size view, displaying reviews in a carousel style slider.

<font color="red">This option allows you to save this spa as a DRAFT spa and then publish it once you are finished drafting the spa. Draft spa are accessed via the "Your spa >> Your draft spa page"</font>
Schedule for publishing on a set date/time.

Schedule your spa to be published on a set date/time. Your scheduled spa can be accessed via the "Your spa >> Your spa awaiting publishing page". Note: Some spa require approval before being displayed publicly.
Scheduled publish date must be set into the future!
This optional description is displayed on the item create and edit forms so that you can explain any details about any of the section inputs.
This title is displayed above the section content on the item overview page.
Section {num}: {title}, must contain at least {min_length} characters.

Sections 2-6 allow you to create additional sections that will display on the item overview page. These sections can contain text via editor input (must enable the editor) and or custom fields set to display in a specific section. Note You must enter a TITLE to enable the section.
Select the category into which new items created from this feed will be posted.
For days that are open 24 hrs, leave the open and close hours set to 00:00 - 00:00
Set item tags for automatically created thread
If enabled, when creating a new item that has tags, those tags will also be applied to the newly created associated discussion thread.
Show new items indicator on showcase tab
A simple view, designed for narrow spaces such as sidebars, displaying items in a carousel style slider.
Select the sort order to fetch items by for this widget
Submit your spa for publishing now. Note: Some spa require approval before being displayed publicly.
There are no authors to display.
There are more comments to display.
There are no comments to display.
There are no items matching your filters.
There are no reviews matching your filters.
There are no updates matching your filters.
This section must contain at least {min_length} characters.
This user will still be able to view this item, but will not be able to comment or rate until the ban expires.
Enter the thread id of an existing discussion thread.

The time limit to delete this item ({editLimit} minutes) has expired.

This action will unassociate the discussion thread from this item.
Checking this box will unset the business hours and remove the business hours sidebar block.
Reply to an update {updateTitle} on the item {itemTitle} by {userName}
Update thread title on item deletion
The update title should be a summarised view of the entire update with 100 characters or less.
Update to {itemTitle} in category {categoryTitle}
Showcase: User has added at least X items
Showcase: User has added no more than X items
Showcase: User has at least 1 item with the prefix id

Showcase: User has no more than X items currently featured

Showcase: User has posted no more than X reviews

Please do not reply to this message. You must visit the forum to reply.

This message was sent to you because you opted to watch the category "{category}" at {board} with email notification of new showcase items.

If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may disable emails from this category or disable all emails.
{author} added a showcase item to a category you are watching at {board}.
{author} commented on an item you are watching at {board_title}.

Please do not reply to this message. You must visit the forum to reply.

This message was sent to you because you opted to watch the showcase item "{item}" at {board} with email notification of item updates, new comments and new reviews.

If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may disable emails from this item or disable all emails.
{author} posted a new update on an item you are watching at {board_title}.
{author} posted a review on an item you are watching at {board_title}.
{author} updated an item you are watching at {board_title}.
{name} added you as co-owner for the item {title}.
{name} added you as a contributor for the item {title}.
{name} also replied to a review of the item {title}.
{name} also replied to the update {update_title} on the item {item_title}.
{user} commented on the item {item}. There may be more comments after this.
{name} has not added any items which matches your filters.
{name} has not posted any items yet.
{name} joined the item contributors team for the item {title}.
{name} left the item contributors team for the item {title}.
{name} mentioned you in a reply to an update {update} on the item {item}.
{user} mentioned you in a comment on the item {item}.
{user} mentioned you in a review on item {item}.
{name} mentioned you in an update {update} to the item {item}.
{username} posted a comment on the item {title}.
{username} posted a reply to a reivew on the item {title}.
{username} posted a reply to the update {update_title} on the item {item_title}.
{username} posted an update {update} on the item {item}.
{user} quoted your comment on the item {item}.
{user} reacted to an anonymous review on the item {item} with {reaction}.
{user} reacted to your comment on item {item} with {reaction}.
{user} reacted to your review on the item {item} with {reaction}.
{user} reacted to your reply to a review on the item {item} with {reaction}.
